act.title: Dialogue Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 我今年二十三岁，我在读大学。
item.pinyin: Wǒ jīnnián èr shí sān suì, wǒ zài dú dàxué.
Dàxué jǐ niánjí, nǐ xué shénme?

item.hanzi: 大学三年级，我学数学，我快毕业了。
item.pinyin: Dàxué sān niánjí, wǒ xué shùxué, wǒ kuài bìyè le.
Bìyè hòu nǐ xiǎng zuò shénme?
Wǒ xiǎng jìn diànnǎo gōngsī gōngzuò.
